comments:
I tried run my test class like I do on WindowsXP, but I received no response.
All I see is a blank console with stop button enabled.
Please provide steps to reproduce. Works fine for us.

I created a new Run configuration on JUnit using one test class.
Progress bar stops about 3 minutes with the message: "Searching for errors in
TestProject".
Then, I received the blank console.
After click stop button on console and shutdown eclipse, this is the log file on

Are you creating a normal JUnit or a JUnit Plugin Test. Can you provide a test
project which reveals the behaviour ?

Moving to PDE to comment on the exceptions which happen in PDE land.

the stack in comment 2 is a dup of bug 91920.  When it happens, it does so 
upon shutdown but it has no bearing on junit testing nor self-hosting in any 
way.

Leandro, do you have any more information?

I disabled my firewall (iptables), JUnit is working perfectly now.
I'm sorry for post this "bug".
Thank you
